data.title: Captured IS Suicide Bomber in Peshmerga hands "When he is treated and well, he will go to prison and rot there for the rest of his life. He will be denied martyrdom. The Kurds want the foreign fighters to know that." - Sky News
Australia increases cigarette prices for the fourth time by almost 15% to $1 a cigarette. Expected to stop 60,000 smokers.
Plans to dump 3 million cubic metres of material dredged from the ocean floor into the Great Barrier Reef area will be abandoned.
Hundreds of Ukrainian troops 'massacred by pro-Russian forces as they waved white flags'

The Islamic States' next target is Pope Francis as the group deems Italy a highly strategic point of attack. An Italian intelligence agency found information that the ISIS is targeting the Pope as he bears false witness against Islam and serves as the "greatest exponent of Christianity".
Anger As Annual Dolphin Hunt Begins In Japan

Merkel Says Europe Won’t Allow Russia ‘Attack’ on Ukraine
